about-me.headline: About Me
about-me.card-part-1: For me, software development is the perfect way to combine my creativity with my passion for structure and logic. I work with a mix of analysis and intuition to craft smooth interactive designs.
about-me.card-part-2: I enjoy working in small, agile teams and value long-term collaboration.

skills.headline: Core Competencies
skills.description: I build dynamic single-page applications with TypeScript and Angular. I also develop responsive and interactive software without frameworks, using vanilla JavaScript. For that, I create appealing designs with modern HTML and CSS.

growth-mindset.title: Growth is essential
growth-mindset.text: For my projects, I always enjoy learning new technologies. Right now, I’m especially curious about:

portfolio.headline: My Work
portfolio.text: Here I collect my best projects – feel free to try them out!

project.learning-join: My most important experience in Join was implementing the Firebase integration for login and database functions. Using services and observables, I made them available to the team across all components.
project.learning-el-pollo-loco: This is where I developed a deeper understanding of how to structure a project involving many objects. In particular, the interaction between classes across different levels became much clearer to me.
project.learning-pokedex: While working with a REST API, I learned how to use asynchronous functions to access deeply nested data structures.
project.description-join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project.description-pokedex: Interactive Pokédex with data from the PokéAPI. Browse Pokémon by type, view details, and explore animated stats and sprites.
project.description-el-pollo-loco: 2D jump-and-run game built with JavaScript and canvas. Battle enemies, collect bottles, and defeat the final boss with strategic timing.

references.headline: What My Colleagues Say About Me

colleague-quote.quote-1: It was a pleasure working with Simon. His strength clearly lies in logical thinking. Even in challenging situations, he consistently found excellent solutions. Communication with him was always clear, reliable, and pleasant.
colleague-quote.quote-2: I was impressed by Simons ability to keep a clear overview of the project at all times. His strong communication skills helped the team stay coordinated and motivated, and his attention to detail ensured that the final result met high standards. A reliable and thoughtful collaborator!
colleague-quote.quote-3: Our collaboration on the website was both effective and fun. Simon's commitment really pushed the project forward. I'd happily start another project with him anytime.
colleague-quote.quote-4: Working with Simon was a truly great experience. He was fully committed, always thought ahead, and worked with impressive reliability. His creative input, in particular, really enriched our project.
